Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Green function curve (as shown in the original image)
*   X-axis with its labels and tick marks (as shown in the original image)
*   Y-axis with its labels and tick marks (as shown in the original image)
*   Visual highlight on the local maximum point of the function

*   Visual highlight on the rightmost local minimum point of the function
